query.sql: SELECT ac.aircraft_name fl.tail_number, ma.airframe_hours_due, airframe_hours FROM maintenance ma JOIN fleet fl ON fl.fleet_id = ma.fleet_id JOIN aircraft ar ON fl.aircraft_id = ac.aircraft_id WHERE ma.airframe_hours_due > fl.airframe_hours

SELECT ac.airframe, fl.tail)number, (ma.airframe_hours_due - fl.airframe_hours) AS available_hours FROM maintenance ma JOIN fleet fl ON fl.fleet_id = ma.fleet_id JOIN aircraft ac ON fl.aircraft_id = ac.aircraft_id WHERE ma.airframe_hours_due > fl.airframe_hours ORDER BY available_hours DESC
